short_summary: Contact Centre as a Services (CCaaS) - Supply Arrangement refresh whilst maintaining current capacity and streamlining processes to ensure contact between government and the public remains accessible and effective.
description: This contracting process is to engage a supplier to provide an "as a Service" Contact Centre service for Shared Services OCN  from a pool of pre-procured suppliers selected through a formal tendering process. The supplier shall have expertise in customer service as related to service desk, contact centre, or a similar customer contact situation.\
full_summary:
================================

**Title:** 
Government Contract: Contact Centre as a Service (CCaaS) Supply Arrangement Refresh

**Reference Number:** SSC-23-00023339: T

**Publication Date:** July 24, 2023

**Closing Date:** October 3, 2023 (2:00 PM ET)

**Contact Information:**
Shared Services Canada
400 Cooper Street
Ottawa, Ontario K2P 2N1
Phone: 613-668-9563
Fax: 613-960-6007
Email: james.graves2@ssc-spc.gc.ca

**Tender Overview**
-----------------

Shared Services Canada (SSC) is seeking a supplier to provide a Contact Centre as a Service (CCaaS) solution. This solicitation is for a refresh of the existing supply arrangement.

**Key Details**
----------------

- **Services Required:** The supplier must provide a contact centre solution that includes voice services, such as customer support and technical support.
- **GSIN Codes:** 399B, T000K
- **Trade Agreements:** The supplier must be able to participate in the following trade agreements:
    - Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
    - Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
    - World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
    - Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
    - Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
    - Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
    - Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
    - Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
    - Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
    - Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
- **Contracting Entity:** Shared Services Canada
- **Regions of Opportunity:** Nationally, with a focus on the National Capital Region (NCR)
- **Regions of Delivery:** Nationally, with a focus on the National Capital Region (NCR)
- **Attachment:** SSC will make available the solicitation documents through its tendering website. Suppliers interested in submitting a bid must review the documentation carefully before submitting a proposal.

**Note:** This tender is closed. Suppliers cannot submit a proposal at this time.  For more information about Shared Services Canada and its procurement processes, please visit its website at [www.ssc-spc.gc.ca](http://www.ssc-spc.gc.ca).  Further information can be obtained by contacting the contracting authority at the address and phone
